author: Special Correspondent
text:
The carcasses of three peacocks were found in the private field near the Vellaiyur Lake near Thalaivasal on Wednesday.

The local residents, who spotted the carcasses, informed the Inter-Face Forest Division, Salem, who in turn brought it to the notice of the Attur Forest Division, which holds control over the area.

The forest personnel visited the spot and a veterinary doctor from the Gangavalli conducted post-mortem on the carcasses on the spot.

The Attur Forest Division sources said that the post-mortem report will reveal the real cause of the death of the birds.
title: Carcasses of peacocks found
